text:
@GavinNewsom Hospitals at 8% capacity?
1) Congratulations
2) This is the FIRST time, in the #COVID19 #Plandemic, when you have been reasonable with statistics
3) I hope this marks a change in D Party conduct
4) Honesty with the voters is the best policy
